description: Orchestrates user journey and coordinates specialist agent handoffs with strict JSON output

result.handoff_to: string (Financial Analyst Agent|Coach Agent|Educator Agent|Advisor Agent|none)

financial_analysis.insights: Recovered a surplus of ₹40,000 after addressing leaks. The income-to-expense ratio is favorable.

result.message: Great job on completing the Intel! You've unlocked a surplus of ₹40,000. Let's address any concerns and build your financial safety shield next.

test_message_used: User just completed Screen 1 (The Intel) with monthly income ₹80,000, fixed bills ₹45,000, and recovered ₹5,000 from plugging leaks. They seem hesitant about moving to Screen 2 (The Shield). What should happen next?
